newsitem.title: HONG KONG: QPL International FRN raised to $150 mln.
newsitem.headline: QPL International FRN raised to $150 mln.

text.p: QPL International Holdings' floating rate note issue has been increased to US$150 million from US$100 million following a strong response in syndication, arranger Standard Chartered Bank said on Tuesday.
The issue has a final maturity of five years. It can be put on the third anniversary and is callable at par on interest payment dates after three years.
The notes pay a margin of 145 basis points over the six-month London Interbank Offered Rate and, with fees, an all-in return of 168 basis points.
Twenty-eight banks joined the syndication. Sumitomo Finance Asia and Standard Chartered Bank were arrangers.
